review: Pretty disappointing. UI is clearly more thought out for Prime content (to be expected, I suppose) than other apps. Spotify app is only Spotify CONNECT, not a full Spotify client (they should call this out in the specs), Netflix UI is bad, search doesn't include Netflix, AND it dropped my wi-fi connection 3/4 of the way through a Netflix movie last night, but the network was up. Had to restart the stick, and stop/restart the app a few times to get it to reconnect. ALSO - HBO Now was a primary reason I purchased, and the HBO video is very stuttery, nigh unwatchable. Netflix, Prime video streams fine. Problem is likely with HBO's streaming, not the stick - but it's a problem. Guess I expected more, this device is getting returned. And - why can't you turn off music lyrics when playing Prime music? Very poor UI choice, IMO.
